hero-section.title: Nature and tech for a better world
hero-section.subtitle: We undestand the industry of the horticulture from a hollistic and innovative perspective.
hero-section.text: We talk plant, the farmer and the entrepreneur, shutting down operative barriers and developeinga the business culture needed for successful investments in the

atom.solutions: We create integrated solutions tailored to specific needs and depending on the phase your business is in. We help you in the design of professional operations for growing green vegetables and / or cannabis with a focus on digitization. We assemble adequate supply chains and make sure that they work according to the goals set. We manage data creation and collection systems that are available in spaces in the cloud, where we take care of processing them so that they facilitate visibility and transparency of information at all levels of your organization.

process.title: Our process
process.s1_text: In a discovery call we understand where you want to take your business and what are the barriers and frustrations you have at the moment to achieve your goals
process.s2_subt: We work on a proposal focused on solving your problems
process.s2_text: We present a solution tailored to your needs based on our areas of knowledge.
process.s3_subt: We are committed to working for your success
process.s3_text: We send you an economic proposal with different options, followed by a service provision contract.
process.s4_text: We begin to land our professional services in your business, hand in hand with your team.

start.title: Our team
start.desc: Hervana Group is formed by a team of interdisciplinary proffesionals with academic formation and world-class experience in Latinamerica, Northamerica, Europe and Asia. Our history began in the Netherlands, nation recognized because it is a hub of innovation y knowledge in horticulture, tech, sustainables and pioneer in the responsible consumption of cannabis. We count with a broad contact network and specialized knowledge in cultivation operations in controlled environments, AgTech, digital transformation, data analytic, business development and strategy; in cannabis industry and blockchain implementation.

start.title: Our history
start.desc: Hervana Group was founded with the purpose of becoming the strategic partner of entrepreneurs in the horticulture industry and the nascent legal cannabis industry, helping them to improve their business models, navigate and implement the use of cutting-edge technologies, and operate with the highest quality standards, always offering solutions tailored to the real needs of our customers.

mission.title: Mission
mission.desc: Revolutionize the present of world horticulture through innovation and applied technology that facilitates the digital transformation of our clients.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc: May Latin America become a digitized horticulture hub, generating harmony in the relationship between human and nature, leading the transformation towards a sustainable, decentralized and transparent world.

start.title: FAQ

q1.desc: Hervana Group is a strategic partner made up of an expert team of professionals specialized in digitization and cultivation operations in controlled environments, analytics and business intelligence, with experience in world-class projects.
